1.content: Marc-AndrÃ© ter Stegen signed as a goalkeeper for FC Barcelona in the summer of 2014 from Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach. Born on April 30, 1992, in the town of MÃ¶nchengladbach, the German stood out from a young age as one of the most promising goalkeepers on the European continent.
